artifacts.title: Local Home-Cooked Meals Platform
artifacts.purpose: Create a web platform connecting local home cooks with neighborhood customers for authentic home-cooked meals.
goals: Facilitate connections between home cooks and customers.
Provide a seamless ordering and payment experience.
Allow users to review and rate cooks and meals.
Encourage culinary diversity and community interaction.

features.title: Cook Profiles
requirements: Cooks can create and manage profiles showcasing their culinary skills.
Profiles include biography, specialties, available menus, and photos.

features.title: Menus with Photos
requirements: Cooks can upload photos of dishes and set availability.
Each menu item includes a description, price, and dietary information.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Secure online payment integration.
Order tracking and history for customers and cooks.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Customers can rate and review meals and cooks.
Cooks can also review customers.

frontend.notes: Should be responsive and user-friendly with a strong emphasis on UX/UI.

backend.notes: RESTful services with secure authentication and session management.

database.notes: Used for storing user profiles, menu items, orders, and reviews.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: SSL certificates for encryption. Secure user authentication process.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Support a growing number of users and cooks joining the platform over time.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Fast load times and real-time updates for order status.

Cook: Create and manage menus with photos.
Customer: Register and browse cook profiles and menus.
Place an order and make payment.
Receive meal and submit a review.

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers.
Average user rating for the platform.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application for both iOS and Android.
AI-driven recommendations for customers based on past orders.
Subscription model for regular meal plans.

artifacts.title: Home Cook Community Platform
artifacts.purpose: To connect local home cooks with individuals in their neighborhood who want to buy authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Provide an easy-to-use platform for home cooks.
Enable customers to purchase meals easily.
Build a community-based review and rating system.

features.title: Profiles for Cooks
requirements: Cooks can create and manage profiles.
Upload profile pictures and a biography.

features.title: Menu with Photos
requirements: Create and manage menus with descriptions and prices.
Upload food photos.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Customers can select and order meals.
Payment via secure gateway.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Cooks and customers can leave reviews and ratings.
Display average ratings on profiles and menu items.

frontend.notes: Should be responsive and user-friendly.

backend.notes: Ensure secure transaction and data handling.

database.notes: Handle user profiles, menus, orders securely.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement HTTPS and secure data storage.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Able to handle increasing number of users and transactions.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Fast load times and quick transactions are crucial.

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers monthly.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application development.
Subscription and loyalty programs.
Integration with local delivery services.

artifacts.title: Local Home-Cooked Meal Platform
artifacts.purpose: Connect local home cooks with individuals in their neighborhood seeking to purchase authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Facilitate access to diverse home-cooked meals for community members.
Empower local cooks to reach a broader customer base.
Provide a secure and efficient system for ordering and payments.
Foster a reliable community feedback system through reviews and ratings.

features.title: Cook Profiles
requirements: Cooks can create and manage their profiles including a biography and culinary specialties.
Simple profile creation and editing interface.

features.title: Menu Management
requirements: Cooks can upload menus with descriptions and photos.
Easy-to-use photo upload and menu editing tool.

features.title: Ordering System
requirements: Customers can browse menus, place orders, and specify delivery preferences.
Intuitive order placement process.

features.title: Payment System
requirements: Supports secure online payment processing.
Integration with secure payment gateways.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Both cooks and customers can leave and view each otherâ€™s reviews and ratings.
User-friendly review submission form.

frontend.notes: Responsive design for accessibility across devices.

backend.notes: RESTful API for efficient feature integration.

database.notes: NoSQL capability to handle diverse and scalable datasets.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Ensure all transactions are securely processed with encryption.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Platform should handle a growing number of users and transactions efficiently.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Fast load times and quick responsiveness for all front-end interactions.

successMetrics: Number of registered cooks and active customers.
Average rating and review score for cooks and overall user satisfaction.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application development for iOS and Android.
Integration with delivery services for logistics support.
Advanced menu analytics to provide insights to cooks.

backend.notes: RESTful API design, authentication, and authorization.

artifacts.title: Web platform for connecting local home cooks with customers
artifacts.purpose: To connect local home cooks with people in their neighborhood who want to buy authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Create a user-friendly platform for seamless interaction between home cooks and local customers.
Ensure a secure, reliable, and efficient payment and ordering process.
Enhance community engagement through the sharing of cultural food diversity.

features.title: Profile Management
requirements: Ability to create and manage personal profiles with information such as cooking styles, available menus, and photos.

features.title: Menu Creation
requirements: Functionality to upload menu items with descriptions and photos.

features.title: Order Management
requirements: Tools to accept or decline orders, manage preparation times, and handle communications with customers.

features.title: Review System
requirements: Ability to receive feedback and ratings from customers.
Leave ratings and reviews for home cooks.

features.title: User Registration and Profile
requirements: Sign-up and manage account details.

features.title: Meal Ordering
requirements: Browse menus, place orders, and make payments.

frontend.notes: Ensure mobile responsiveness and accessibility compliance.

backend.notes: Implement RESTful services with JWT for authentication.

database.notes: Data should be indexed to optimize search features for menus and cooks.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Use SSL encryption and implement roles-based access control.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Design with microservices architecture to support future growth.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Response time for user actions should be under 2 seconds.

Customer: Sign up and create a profile.
Rate and review the meal experience.

successMetrics: Number of active home cooks and customers.
Customer satisfaction scores based on reviews.
futureEnhancements: Introduce a subscription model for regular meal deliveries.
Implement community-based forums for discussion and suggestions.
Develop an in-app messaging system for cook-customer interactions.

artifacts.title: Home Cook Connection Platform
artifacts.purpose: Connect local home cooks with neighborhood customers for purchasing authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Enable home cooks to showcase culinary skills.
Provide convenience for ordering meals.
Ensure secure transactions.
Cultivate a community of food enthusiasts.

features.title: Cook Profile Management
requirements: Home cooks can create and manage profiles.
Includes photos, biography, and cooking specialties.

features.title: Menu and Meal Listings
requirements: Cooks can create and update menus.
Includes photos, descriptions, prices, and availability.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Customers can place orders and pay.
Secure payment gateway integration.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Allows reviews and ratings for both parties.
Ensure compliance with community guidelines.

frontend.notes: Responsive design necessary to ensure usability across devices.

backend.notes: RESTful API architecture for seamless data handling.

database.notes: Document-based storage to handle varying data structures for user profiles and menus.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement SSL, user authentication and authorization.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Design for up to 10,000 concurrent users.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Load time must not exceed 3 seconds.

Customer: Register and browse profiles and menus.

futureEnhancements: Mobile applications for iOS and Android.
In-app customer support chat.
Delivery service integration.

artifacts.title: Home-Cooked Meals Platform
artifacts.purpose: Connect local home cooks with people who want to buy home-cooked meals.
goals: Facilitate the discovery of local home cooks and their offerings.
Provide a seamless ordering and payment experience.
Ensure a trusted environment through reviews and ratings.

features.title: User Profiles
requirements: Home Cook Profile: Showcase bio, kitchen photos, menu, operating hours.
Customer Profile: Manage orders, payment methods, and reviews.

features.title: Menu and Photos
requirements: Cooks can create, update, and display menus.
Photos accompanying each menu item.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Customers can order meals.
Integrated payment processing to handle transactions.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Customers can rate and review the cooks.
Cooks can review customers.

frontend.notes: Responsive design for mobile and desktop.

backend.notes: REST API with high concurrency handling.

database.notes: Flexible schema for nested menu and review data.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Secure user data and transactions using HTTPS and encryption.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Efficiently handle growing numbers of cooks and customers.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Load times under 2 seconds for core features.

Home Cook: Setup profile, list menu, manage orders, view reviews.
Customer: Browse menus, place orders, make payments, and leave reviews.

successMetrics: Number of active home cook profiles.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application versions for iOS and Android.
Enhanced search and discovery features using AI.
Integration with delivery services for meal pick-up.

artifacts.title: Local Home Cook Meal Platform
artifacts.purpose: The purpose of this web platform is to connect local home cooks with people in their neighborhood who want to buy authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Enable home cooks to showcase their culinary skills and generate income.
Provide customers access to a variety of authentic, home-cooked meals.
Facilitate a seamless ordering and payment process.
Build a community through review and rating systems for cooks and customers.

features.title: Cook Profiles
requirements: Allow cooks to set up and manage their profiles.
Include biography and specialties.
Display customer reviews and ratings.

features.title: Menu Management
requirements: Allow cooks to create and update menus.
Include options to upload photos and descriptions.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Implement a secure payment gateway.
Allow customers to place orders and make payments easily.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Enable customers to rate and review cooks.
Allow cooks to rate and review customers.

frontend.notes: Ensure a responsive and user-friendly interface compatible with web and mobile browsers.

backend.notes: Manage API requests and handle authentication securely.

database.notes: Store user profiles, menus, orders, reviews, and ratings efficiently.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement HTTPS, data encryption, and secure user authentication.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Design the system to handle increased loads by scaling horizontally.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Ensure fast response times with optimized database queries and caching strategies.

Home Cook: Set up a menu with photos and descriptions.
Receive and manage orders from customers.
View and respond to customer reviews.
Customer: Sign up and browse cook profiles and menus.
Place and pay for orders through an integrated system.

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers on the platform.
Customer and cook satisfaction scores as reflected in reviews.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application development for iOS and Android.
Introduction of a subscription model for regular meals delivery.
Advanced search filters based on dietary preferences and restrictions.

artifacts.title: Local Home-Cooked Meals Platform
artifacts.purpose: Connect home cooks with neighborhood customers for authentic meal purchases.
goals: Facilitate connections between home cooks and customers.
Provide a seamless ordering and payment experience.
Ensure reliable and trustworthy ratings and reviews.
Encourage community engagement through local culinary experiences.

features.title: Profile Management
requirements: Users can create and manage their profiles.
Cooks can upload a profile picture and description.

features.title: Menu and Photo Gallery
requirements: Cooks can create menus with dish descriptions and photos.
Customers can view these menus.

features.title: Ordering System
requirements: Customers can place orders directly.
Order tracking for both parties.

features.title: Payment System
requirements: Secure online payment gateway integration.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Both cooks and customers can leave reviews.
Aggregate rating displayed on profiles.

frontend.notes: Responsive design for desktop and mobile access.

backend.notes: RESTful API development.

database.notes: Document-based storage to accommodate flexible data models.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement OAuth 2.0 for secure authentication and authorization. Encrypted payment transactions ensuring PCI compliance.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Support for scaling up to 10,000 concurrent users initially.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Average page load time under 2 seconds.

Home Cook: Manage orders and communicate with customers.
Customer: Review and rate meals and cooks.

successMetrics: 70% user retention within the first month after registration.
Average customer satisfaction rating above 4.0 out of 5.
Achieve 1,000 orders per month by the end of the first year.
futureEnhancements: Implementing a subscription model for regular deliveries.
Developing a mobile application for iOS and Android.
Incorporating AI recommendations for menu selections based on prior orders.

artifacts.title: Local Home-Cooked Meal Platform
artifacts.purpose: The purpose of this document is to outline the requirements for developing a web platform that connects local home cooks with people in their neighborhood who wish to purchase authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Facilitate connections between local home cooks and potential customers.
Provide a seamless ordering and payment experience.
Ensure a trustworthy and transparent platform with reviews and ratings for both cooks and customers.

features.title: User Profiles
requirements: Home cooks and customers can create and manage their profiles.

features.title: Menus with Photos
requirements: Cooks can create menus with photos of their dishes.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Secure order and payment processing for meals.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Customers and cooks can rate and review each other.

frontend.notes: Responsive design to cater to various device sizes.

backend.notes: RESTful API design for seamless communication between client and server.

database.notes: Schema design optimized for user profiles, menus, orders, and reviews.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Use HTTPS and data encryption for secure transactions and data protection.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Design for horizontal scalability to accommodate growing user base.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Ensure low-latency responses with optimized database queries and efficient code.

Home Cook: Upload menus with photos of dishes.
Customer: Register and browse local cooks through profiles.
View menu items and place orders.

successMetrics: Number of registered home cooks and customers.
Frequency of orders placed through the platform.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application for enhanced accessibility.
Integration with local delivery services.
Community forums for cook and customer interactions.

artifacts.title: Local Home-Cooked Meals Platform
artifacts.purpose: A web platform that connects local home cooks with people in their neighborhood to buy authentic home-cooked meals.
goals: Empower local home cooks to reach a broader market.
Provide customers with access to a variety of home-cooked meals.
Ensure seamless transaction and communication between cooks and customers.

features.title: Cook Profiles
requirements: Create and edit personal profiles.
Display culinary experience and specialty dishes.

features.title: Menu Management
requirements: Add and update menu items, including photos.
Set pricing and availability schedules.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Seamless order placement and tracking.
Secure payment gateway integration.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Customers can review and rate cooks.
Cooks can rate customer experiences.

frontend.notes: Responsive design for both desktop and mobile use.

backend.notes: RESTful API structure to handle data interchange.

database.notes: Ensure data consistency and support for high data loads.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Data encryption in transit and at rest.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Support increasing numbers of users without performance drop.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Load time under 3 seconds for main pages.

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application development.
Subscription services for regular customers.
AI-based meal recommendations.

artifacts.title: Home-Cooked Meal Web Platform
artifacts.purpose: The purpose of this project is to develop a web platform that connects local home cooks with people in their neighborhood who want to purchase authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Facilitate connections between home cooks and local customers.
Provide a seamless ordering and payment experience.
Enable cooks to showcase their culinary offerings with profiles and menus.
Establish a reliable review and rating system to build trust within the community.

features.title: Profile Management
requirements: Each cook must have a profile including personal information, culinary skills, and contact information.
Customers should have profiles to manage order history and reviews.

features.title: Menu and Photos
requirements: Cooks can create and manage a menu with detailed descriptions and photos of each dish.
Customers can view menus and photos to make informed choices.

features.title: Ordering System
requirements: Customers can place orders for meals via a user-friendly interface.
Order tracking should be available for both cooks and customers.

features.title: Payment System
requirements: Integration with multiple payment gateways for secure transactions.
Payment confirmation and receipts must be automated.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Both cooks and customers can rate and review after transactions.
A reputation system for cooks based on cumulative ratings.

frontend.notes: Responsive design to support both desktop and mobile users.

backend.notes: REST API-based architecture for scalability and modularity.

database.notes: Designed to handle dynamic content and scalable user data.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Use HTTPS for all data transmission. Implement OAuth 2.0 for secure login.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Design to accommodate increasing numbers of users and transactions without performance degradation.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Load times under 2 seconds for main user interactions.

Cook: Sign up and create a profile.
List menu items with descriptions and photos.
Manage incoming orders and communicate with customers.
Customer: Sign up and create a profile.
Browse menus and select a meal.
Place an order and complete payment.
Rate the meal and the cook.

successMetrics: Average rating of cooks and meals.
futureEnhancements: Mobile application for iOS and Android devices.
Machine learning for personalized meal recommendations.
Partnership with local farms for sustainable ingredient sourcing.

artifacts.title: Local Home Cook Marketplace
artifacts.purpose: To connect local home cooks with neighbors seeking home-cooked meals.
goals: Empower local home cooks by providing a marketplace for their meals.
Ensure a seamless and reliable ordering process for customers.
Build a community-driven platform with reviews and ratings to maintain quality and trust.

features.title: Profile Management
requirements: Users (cooks and customers) can create and manage their profiles.

features.title: Menu and Photo Gallery
requirements: Cooks can create and edit menus with photos of their dishes.

features.title: Ordering System
requirements: Customers can browse menus, place orders, and specify delivery/pickup preferences.

features.title: Payment System
requirements: Users can securely process payments via the platform, supporting major credit/debit cards.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Both cooks and customers can rate and review each other.

features.title: Admin Dashboard
requirements: Administrators can manage users, oversee transactions, and handle disputes.

frontend.notes: Responsive design for desktop and mobile users.

backend.notes: Handle user authentication, payment transactions, and data processing.

database.notes: Store user profiles, menu items, orders, reviews, and ratings.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement SSL for secure data transmission. Use OAuth for user authentication.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Architect the system to handle up to 100,000 users concurrently.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Ensure average page load speed is under 2 seconds.

Customer: Browse local cooks and their menus.
Rate the meal and the cook post-purchase.
Administrator: Monitor platform activity and ensure compliance.
Manage customer support and conflict resolution.

successMetrics: Active user retention rate above 70% monthly.
Average user satisfaction rating of 4.5 stars or higher.
futureEnhancements: Implement a subscription model for regular meal deliveries.
Introduce social features, like following favorite cooks.
Develop a mobile application for iOS and Android.

artifacts.title: Local Home-Cooked Meals Platform
artifacts.purpose: The purpose of this platform is to facilitate connections between local home cooks and people within their neighborhoods who wish to purchase authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Enable customers to easily find and order meals from local home cooks.
Provide an intuitive profile system for cooks to showcase their menu and culinary skills.
Ensure a secure and seamless ordering and payment process.
Incorporate a reliable review and rating system for both cooks and customers.

features.title: Profile for Cooks
requirements: Cooks can create and update their profiles with personal details, culinary experience, and menu offerings.

features.title: Menu Management
requirements: Cooks can upload menu items along with photos and descriptions.

features.title: Ordering System
requirements: Customers can browse menus, place orders, and pay through the platform.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Both customers and cooks can leave reviews and ratings for one another.

frontend.notes: Use a responsive design for all devices.

backend.notes: Implement RESTful APIs to handle data transactions.

database.notes: Store user profiles, menu items, and order details.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Use HTTPS for secure data transmission.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Implement load balancing to manage increased demand.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Ensure low latency for user interactions.

Home Cook: Sign up and create a profile
Customer: Sign up and browse cook profiles
Select meals from menus and place orders

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers on the platform.
futureEnhancements: Implement a feature for real-time chat between cooks and customers.
Add a rewards system for frequent buyers.
Introduce a mobile app version of the platform.

artifacts.title: Local Home-Cook Connection Platform
artifacts.purpose: A web platform to connect local home cooks with individuals in their neighborhood for buying authentic home-cooked meals.
goals: Create a seamless marketplace for home-cooked meals.
Empower local cooks by providing a platform to reach potential customers.
Offer customers a diverse selection of home-cooked meals to order and pay for online.
Build trust and reliability through a review and rating system.

features.title: Cook Profiles
requirements: Create and manage personal profiles
Upload and update menu with photos

features.title: Menu and Ordering System
requirements: List meals available for order
Browse menus by location and cuisine
Online ordering and payment processing

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Customers can rate and review cooks
Cooks can provide feedback on customers

features.title: Customer Profiles
requirements: Create and manage personal profiles
View order history and past ratings

frontend.notes: Create a responsive and intuitive user interface.

backend.notes: Implement RESTful API architecture for scalability.

database.notes: Use NoSQL for flexibility in managing user-generated content.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement SSL encryption, user authentication, and protect against SQL Injection.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Ensure architecture supports growing numbers of users and transactions.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Optimize for fast load times and responsive interactions.

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers using the platform.
Retention rate of both cooks and customers.
Percentage of issues resolved within 24 hours.
futureEnhancements: Implement a mobile application for Android and iOS.
Introduce a subscription model for regular meal deliveries.
Expand to include international cuisines and markets.
Integrate with local delivery services for faster meal distribution.

artifacts.title: Local Home Cook Platform
artifacts.purpose: The purpose of this document is to outline the requirements for a web platform that connects local home cooks with people in their neighborhood who want to buy authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Facilitate connections between local home cooks and customers.
Provide a seamless ordering and payment process.
Allow users to view detailed profiles, photos, and menus of home cooks.
Enable a review and rating system to ensure quality and reliability.

features.title: User Profiles
requirements: Home cooks must be able to create and edit profiles, including uploading photos and menu details.
Customers must have profiles for reviewing order history and providing ratings.

features.title: Menu Management
requirements: Cooks should be able to upload and manage their menus, including dishes, prices, and photos.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Customers can place orders and make payments through the platform using secure payment methods.
Includes order tracking and confirmation features.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Allows customers to rate and review home cooks.
Cooks can also rate customers.

frontend.notes: Responsive design is crucial for both desktop and mobile devices.

backend.notes: Implement RESTful APIs for smooth data exchange.

database.notes: Efficient storage and retrieval of user profiles, menus, and transaction data.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement secure payment processing with encryption. User data protection compliance (e.g., GDPR).
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Design to handle increasing numbers of users without performance degradation.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Ensure fast load times and responsive user interactions.

Home Cook: Add menu items with photos and prices
Customer: Search for home cooks by location or cuisine

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers.
futureEnhancements: Incorporate a delivery tracking system.
Mobile applications for iOS and Android.
Loyalty programs and discounts for frequent customers.

artifacts.title: Home Cook Meal Platform
artifacts.purpose: Connect local home cooks with people wanting home-cooked meals.
goals: Establish a marketplace for home-cooked meals.
Provide a seamless ordering and payment experience.
Enable cooks to showcase culinary skills.
Facilitate a review and rating system.

features.title: Cook Profiles
requirements: Create and manage profiles
Include contact information and pictures

features.title: Menu Management
requirements: Upload menus with descriptions
Add photos of dishes

features.title: Payment System
requirements: Secure payment options

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Rate and review cooks and customers

frontend.notes: Responsive design for desktop and mobile.

backend.notes: RESTful APIs to handle user data and transactions.

database.notes: NoSQL database for non-relational data handling.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement SSL, authentication, and encryption.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Horizontal scaling to accommodate more users.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Pages should load within 2 seconds.

Cook: Set up a menu with dishes and pricing
Customer: Sign up and browse local cooks

artifacts.title: Local Home Cooking Platform
artifacts.purpose: The platform connects local home cooks with their neighbors looking for authentic home-cooked meals.
goals: Facilitate connections between home cooks and local customers.
Offer a wide variety of cuisines and meals.
Ensure a secure and efficient payment system.
Encourage mutual feedback through a rating system.

features.title: Cook Profile Management
requirements: Cooks can set up a profile with personal details and cooking specialties.
Must include photo uploads and description fields.

features.title: Menu Creation and Management
requirements: Cooks can create and manage their menu items, including names, descriptions, prices, and photos.

features.title: Order and Payment System
requirements: Customers can order and pay for meals using secure payment methods.
Must support order tracking and confirmation.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Both customers and cooks can rate and review each other post-transaction.

features.title: Customer Profile Management
requirements: Customers can set up an account to manage orders and reviews.

frontend.notes: Responsive design to ensure accessibility on all device types.

backend.notes: REST API for seamless frontend-backend communication.

database.notes: NoSQL database to handle dynamic menu data efficiently.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Use SSL for data encryption in transit. Secure login and authentication via OAuth2.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Cloud hosting with auto-scaling capabilities.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Page load times under 2 seconds. Efficient database queries for quick data retrieval.

Cook: Receive customer orders and manage them.
View and respond to customer reviews.
Customer: Search for nearby cooks and browse menus.
Receive meal delivery and provide feedback.
Manage personal profile and view order history.

successMetrics: Number of active cooks listing menus.
futureEnhancements: Implement AI-based meal recommendation system.
Develop a mobile app for iOS and Android.
Introduce social media integration for sharing experiences.

artifacts.title: Simple Pizza Place Website
artifacts.purpose: To outline the requirements for a simple website for a pizza place using Express.js and in-memory SQLite.
goals: Provide a simple and intuitive web presence for the pizza place.
Allow customers to view information about the pizza place and contact the owner through a simple form.
Keep the initial deployment lightweight and easy to maintain.

features.title: Homepage
requirements: Displays general information about the pizza place.

features.title: Contact Page
requirements: Contact form with fields: subject, phone number, and message.
Form fields must have the following IDs: subject, phone, message.
Submissions are stored using in-memory SQLite during server runtime.

frontend.notes: Simple, static HTML pages with minimal styling.

backend.notes: Use Express to serve static pages and handle form submissions.

database.notes: Store form submissions in-memory; data does not persist on restart.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Basic input validation for the contact form.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Designed for low traffic and easy scaling with static site hosting and minimal backend.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Quick load times with minimal dependencies.

Owner: Updates website content and checks form submissions stored during the current server session.
Customer: Visits the homepage to get pizza place information.
Fills in the form fields (subject, phone, message) and submits the form.

successMetrics: Website loads successfully in major browsers.
Contact form submissions are received and stored in memory.
Users can navigate between homepage and contact page without issues.
futureEnhancements: Persist form data in a permanent database.
Add more pages such as a menu or about page.
Enhance styling with a CSS framework or design overhaul.
